issue.title: [Rust] Convert File to T: Read + Seek for schema inference
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4449](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4449). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Arrow-4376 allowed us to read csv from a record iterator. We still require a `File` when inferring schemas.

We propose changing from a File to something more generic. See discussion: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3508#issuecomment-457986171

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4449?focusedCommentId=16762618) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3541
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3541>
